intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Reflect on your own experiences of feeling unheard or invalidated. Understanding what you needed in those moments can help you offer better validation to others.

subsections.title: Describe a time when you felt unheard or invalidated
subsections.placeholder: What happened? Who was involved? What did they say or do that made you feel unheard?

subsections.title: What emotions did you experience?
subsections.placeholder: Hurt, frustrated, angry, sad, lonely, misunderstood, etc.

subsections.title: What response did you need?
subsections.placeholder: What words, tone, or actions would have made you feel validated?

subsections.title: How could you validate others more effectively?
subsections.placeholder: What specific changes will you make in how you respond to others' emotions?
